items.title: Save $500 today on Alienware’s 2025 Aurora RTX 5070 gaming desktop while it’s down to $1,550 all-time low
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops an Alienware Aurora RTX 5070 gaming PC to $1,549.99 shipped. This particular config with Intel’s Core Ultra 7 processor and 32GB RAM typically goes for $2,050, so you’re looking at a straight-up $500 discount on it today. We saw the variant of this PC with 16GB RAM go for less earlier this month, but today’s offer delivers a better value for your money with a more powerful config. Dell is also matching the price of this Alienware PC at its website where you’ll find other configs of this machine discounted as well. Head below for more details.

items.summary:
Courtesy of Anker’s official Amazon storefront, Prime members can now score the brand’s Qi2 15W 3-in-1 MagGo charging station in white for $59.99 shipped. This unit usually sells for $111, so Prime members are looking at a nearly 50% discount right now, which lands it $6 below its previous all-time low. The charging station also includes a 5-foot USB-C cable and a 40W charger, adding even more value to this package today. You can also get this in black, though it’s currently fetching $79.99 shipped with a relatively lighter deal. Head below for more details.
